original_text:
“Have you journeyed to the springs of the sea
    or walked in the recesses of the deep?
korean_text: 네가 바다의 샘에 들어갔었느냐 깊은 물 밑으로 걸어 다녀 보았느냐

sentences.original_text: Have you journeyed to the springs of the sea
or walked in the recesses of the deep?
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 깊음의 은밀한 곳들을 걸어 보았는가?
